forecaster.strategy.transaction.util module¶

Defines helper functions for identifying an account’s min/max.

forecaster.strategy.transaction.util.group_default_methods(field_names=LimitTuple(min_inflow='min_inflow_link', max_inflow='max_inflow_link', min_outflow='min_outflow_link', max_outflow='max_outflow_link'))[source]¶

Returns methods returning sets of linked accts. as a LimitTuple.

forecaster.strategy.transaction.util.transaction_default_methods(field_names=LimitTuple(min_inflow='min_inflows', max_inflow='max_inflows', min_outflow='min_outflows', max_outflow='max_outflows'))[source]¶

Returns methods for finding min/max in/outflows as a LimitTuple.
